about_the_game:
Key Features:
• Lots of Shooting
• Endless Waves of Enemies
• Items and Powerups
• Combo Counter
• Highscores

MewMew – PewPew is an endless wave arena shooter where you play as MewMew, whose home gets invaded by dinosaurs from alternative reality. Your goal is to survive for as long as you can, while trying to break the highscores. To gain the maximum score, stay in combat and kill the enemies to increase your combo counter, which directly affects your score gained. Get hit or stay out of combat for too long and your combo will decrease. In short, kill everything that moves until the inevitable death reaches you.

name: MewMew - PewPew

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon HD 7950 or higher
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dinosaurs have invaded MewMew’s home and now it's time for him to pick up his trusty old meteor gun and send them right back to extinction. Keep your combo as high as possible and get stronger with items and powerups as you try to gain highscores in this chaotic 2D horde shooter.
